answers.answer: Have you been checked for thyroid problems?  Celiac and other malabsorption problems?  If you drink sweet or artificially sweetened beverages, switch to water.  What are your most frequently consumed foods?  These may be trigger foods you are addicted to.  Replace the top two with other foods that are healthier.
